text: The 1975 Virginia Senate elections were held on November 4, 1975, alongside the Virginia House of Delegates election. All 40 seats in the Senate of Virginia were up for election.https://historical.elections.virginia.gov/data/serve_file_pages_for_item/48428/Election/ ==Overall results== {| style="width:60%; text-align:center;" |+ ↓ |- style="color:white;" | style="background:blue; width:87.5%;" | 35 | style="background:red; width:13.5%;" | 5 |- | Democratic | Republican |} {| class=wikitable ! style="background-color:#E9E9E9" align=center rowspan= 2 colspan=2| Parties ! style="background-color:#E9E9E9" align=center colspan=4| Seats ! style="background-color:#E9E9E9" align=center colspan=3| Popular Vote |- ! align=center | 1971 ! align=center | 1975 ! align=center | +/- ! align=center | Strength ! align=center | Vote ! align=center | % ! align=center | Change |- |align=left|Democratic | align=right | 34 | align=right | 35 | align=right | 1 | align=right | 87.50% | align=right | 588,993 | align=right | 69.62% | align=right | 5.17% |- |align=left|Republican | align=right | 6 | align=right | 5 | align=right | 1 | align=right | 13.50% | align=right | 221,545 | align=right | 26.19% | align=right | 5.45% |- | Independent | align=right | 0 | align=right | 0 | align=right | | align=right | 0.00% | align=right | 35,283 | align=right | 4.17% | align=right | 0.29% |- | - | Write-ins | align=right | 0 | align=right | 0 | align=right | | align=right | 0.00% | align=right | 240 | align=right | 0.03% | align=right | 0.01% |- ! align=center colspan="2" |Total ! align=center | 40 ! align=center | 40 ! align=center | 0 ! align=center | 100.00% ! align=center | 846,061 ! align=center | 100.00% ! align=center | - |} == See also == * United States elections, 1975 * Virginia elections, 1975 ** Virginia House of Delegates election, 1975 ==References== Virginia Category:1975 Virginia elections Category:Virginia General Assembly elections
